resources.string:
Travel Logger App 

 This app serves as a travel journal. User can add notes about their trips and can add trip wishlist 



 Music: bensound_memories.mp3 from 
 http://www.bensound.com 





 Developed By: 

 Jaina Patel 
 Khirthana Subramanian 





 UOIT 
 Mobile Devices 2016

The Home screen of the app will show you the current date, time and location.


To add a note about a recent trip, go to Notes from menu and you will have the option of adding, deleting or browsing the notes.


The trip wishlist page lets you add trip destinations that you would like to visit, once visited you can check the checkbox off.


Hope this app is useful to everyone. Have fun adding all your travelling memories!
